content: If you travel at a constant speed of 65 miles per hour for 4.5 hours, how far will you have traveled?

If you travel at a constant speed of 65 miles per hour for 4.5 hours, you can calculate the distance traveled using the formula:

Distance = Speed × Time

Plugging in the values:

Distance = 65 miles/hour × 4.5 hours

Distance = 292.5 miles

So, you will have traveled 292.5 miles.
